channel.title: Comments on: In Memory of Emily Carr

item.title: By: tighr10
item.dc:creator: tighr10
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/03/03/in-memory-of-emily-carr/#comment-3303">katherine</a>.
Katherine, Emily Carr will be recognized for her rughooking art during the TIGHR Triennial which is open to members of the organization. We are creating rugs/artwork hooked inspired by her style. See information about the Triennial on our site tighr.net
item.content:encoded:
In reply to katherine.

Katherine, Emily Carr will be recognized for her rughooking art during the TIGHR Triennial which is open to members of the organization. We are creating rugs/artwork hooked inspired by her style. See information about the Triennial on our site tighr.net

item.title: By: katherine
item.dc:creator: katherine
item.description: where is the celebration held for Emily carr and what does it cost?
